alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 2:10AM MST until January 17 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow can be expected through this evening. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches above 6000 feet. Wind gusts to 40 mph at times will cause blowing snow and low visibilities. * WHERE...Chiricahua, Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon
